items.sentence: I got to know my current girlfriend at the gym.
It's not easy writing a love letter in English.
Tom said he wanted to play tennis this morning.
Tom and his wife never take vacations together.
It was a mistake for me to testify against Tom.
I hope that Tom doesn't have to move to Boston.
I overheard Tom saying he was moving to Boston.
Why should I say sorry when it wasn't my fault?
It was the most beautiful sound I'd ever heard.
The buildings we saw were absolutely beautiful.
